name: Daniel Savio
description: '''Daniel Savio''' (born 6 April 1978), is a Swedish [[electronic music]]ian, composer and DJ. He is recognized as the originator of the genre term [[skweee]], describing the sparse electronic music style initially released on Scandinavian record label Flogsta Danshall. With their release of the single "The Bubble Bump" in 2006, the label also debuted Daniel Savio's solo material.
